verses.verse: Now it came to pass <S%H1732><s%>, as David sat <S%H3427><s%> in his house <S%H1004><s%>, that David <S%H1732><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Nathan <S%H5416><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%>, Behold <S%H3427><s%>, I live in an house <S%H1004><s%> of cedars <S%H730><s%>, but the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> remains under curtains <S%H3407><s%>.
Then Nathan <S%H5416><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto David <S%H1732><s%>, Do <S%H6213><s%> all that is in your heart <S%H3824><s%>; for God is with you <S%H430><s%>.
And it came to pass the same night <S%H3915><s%>, that the word <S%H1697><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> came to Nathan <S%H5416><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Go <S%H3212><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%>, Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, You shall not build <S%H1129><s%> me a house <S%H1004><s%> to live in <S%H3427><s%>:

For I have not lived in <S%H3427><s%> a house <S%H1004><s%> since the day <S%H3117><s%> that I brought up <S%H5927><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> unto this day <S%H3117><s%>; but have gone from tent <S%H168><s%> to tent <S%H168><s%>, and from one tabernacle to another <S%H4908><s%>.

Wherever I have walked <S%H1980><s%> with all Israel <S%H3478><s%>, spoke <S%H1696><s%> I a word <S%H1697><s%> to any <S%H259><s%> of the judges <S%H8199><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, whom I commanded <S%H6680><s%> to feed <S%H7462><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Why have you not built <S%H1129><s%> me an house <S%H1004><s%> of cedars <S%H730><s%>?

Now therefore thus shall you say <S%H559><s%> unto my servant <S%H5650><s%> David <S%H1732><s%>, Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, I took <S%H3947><s%> you from the sheep fold <S%H5116><s%>, even from following <S%H310><s%> the sheep <S%H6629><s%>, that you should be ruler <S%H5057><s%> over my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>:

And I have been with you wherever you have walked <S%H1980><s%>, and have cut off <S%H3772><s%> all your enemies <S%H341><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H6213><s%>, and have made you a name <S%H8034><s%> like the name <S%H8034><s%> of the great men <S%H1419><s%> that are in the earth <S%H776><s%>.

Also I will ordain <S%H7760><s%> a place <S%H4725><s%> for my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and will plant <S%H5193><s%> them <S%H7931><s%>, and they shall live in their place <S%H7264><s%>, and shall be moved no more <S%H1121><s%>; neither shall the sons of wickedness <S%H5766><s%> waste <S%H1086><s%> them any more <S%H3254><s%>, as at the beginning <S%H7223><s%>,

And since the time <S%H3117><s%> that I commanded <S%H6680><s%> judges <S%H8199><s%> to be over my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>. Moreover I will subdue <S%H3665><s%> all your enemies <S%H341><s%>. Furthermore I tell <S%H5046><s%> you that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will build <S%H1129><s%> you an house <S%H1004><s%>.

And it shall come to pass <S%H3117><s%>, when your days be expired <S%H4390><s%> that you must go <S%H3212><s%> to be with your fathers <S%H1><s%>, that I will raise up <S%H6965><s%> your seed <S%H2233><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you <S%H1121><s%>, which shall be of your sons; and I will establish <S%H3559><s%> his kingdom <S%H4438><s%>.
He shall build <S%H1129><s%> me a house <S%H1004><s%>, and I will establish <S%H3559><s%> his throne <S%H3678><s%> for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>.

I will be his father <S%H1><s%>, and he shall be my son <S%H1121><s%>: and I will not take <S%H5493><s%> my mercy <S%H2617><s%> away <S%H5493><s%> from him <S%H5493><s%>, as I took it from him that was before you <S%H6440><s%>:

But I will settle <S%H5975><s%> him in my house <S%H1004><s%> and in my kingdom <S%H4438><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>: and his throne <S%H3678><s%> shall be established <S%H3559><s%> for <S%H5704><s%> evermore <S%H5769><s%>.
According to all these words <S%H1697><s%>, and according to all this vision <S%H2377><s%>, so did Nathan <S%H5416><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> unto David <S%H1732><s%>.

And David <S%H1732><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and sat <S%H3427><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Who am I <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord God <S%H430><s%>, and what is my house <S%H1004><s%>, that you have brought <S%H935><s%> me until now <S%H1988><s%>?

And yet this was a small thing <S%H6994><s%> in your eyes <S%H5869><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>; for you have also spoken <S%H1696><s%> of your servant <S%H5650><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%> for a great while to come <S%H7350><s%>, and have regarded <S%H7200><s%> me according to the estate <S%H8448><s%> of a man <S%H120><s%> of high degree <S%H4609><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%>.
What can <S%H3254><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> speak more <S%H3254><s%> to you for the honor <S%H3519><s%> of your servant <S%H5650><s%>? for you know <S%H3045><s%> your servant <S%H5650><s%>.

O Lord <S%H3068><s%>, for your servant <S%H5650><s%>'s sake <S%H3820><s%>, and according to your own heart, have you done <S%H6213><s%> all this greatness <S%H1420><s%>, in making known <S%H3045><s%> all these great things <S%H1420><s%>.
O Lord <S%H3068><s%>, there is none like you <S%H430><s%>, neither is there any God beside <S%H2108><s%> you <S%H8085><s%>, according to all that we have heard with our ears <S%H241><s%>.

And what one <S%H259><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%> is like your people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>, whom God <S%H430><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> to redeem <S%H6299><s%> to be his own people <S%H5971><s%>, to make <S%H7760><s%> you a name <S%H8034><s%> of greatness <S%H1420><s%> and terribleness <S%H3372><s%>, by driving out <S%H1644><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> your people <S%H5971><s%>, whom you have redeemed <S%H6299><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>?

For your people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> did you make <S%H5414><s%> your own people <S%H5971><s%> for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>; and you <S%H3068><s%>, Lord, became their God <S%H430><s%>.

Therefore now <S%H3068><s%>, Lord, let the thing <S%H1697><s%> that you have spoken <S%H1696><s%> concerning your servant <S%H5650><s%> and concerning his house <S%H1004><s%> be established <S%H539><s%> for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> as you have said <S%H1696><s%>.

Let it even be established <S%H539><s%>, that your name <S%H8034><s%> may be magnified <S%H1431><s%> for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, The Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> is the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, even a God <S%H430><s%> to Israel <S%H3478><s%>: and let the house <S%H1004><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> your servant <S%H5650><s%> be established <S%H3559><s%> before you <S%H6440><s%>.

For you <S%H430><s%>, O my God, have told <S%H1540><s%> your servant <S%H5650><s%> that you will build <S%H1129><s%> him a house <S%H1004><s%>: therefore your servant <S%H5650><s%> has found <S%H4672><s%> in his heart to pray <S%H6419><s%> before you <S%H6440><s%>.
And now <S%H3068><s%>, Lord, you are God <S%H430><s%>, and have promised <S%H1696><s%> this goodness <S%H2896><s%> unto your servant <S%H5650><s%>:

Now therefore let it please <S%H2974><s%> you to bless <S%H1288><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of your servant <S%H5650><s%>, that it may be before <S%H6440><s%> you for ever <S%H5769><s%>: for you bless <S%H1288><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and it shall be blessed <S%H1288><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
